channel.title: Lord of the Rings on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Lord of the Rings on Game6r

item.title: Game The Lord of the Rings - Hobbit Adventure
item.description: Armed with a sword, set off to save your friends who have been wrapped in cocoons by evil spiders. To get to them, you have to climb a lot of trees. Collect stones along the way - this is the perfect weapon against monsters. In situations where you are surrounded by a crowd of spiders, you can use the magic of the ring of omnipotence to disappear for a while.

item.title: Game The Lord of the Rings 2014 Shadow of Mordor
item.description: The game The Lord of the Rings 2014 Shadow of Mordor invites you to repel the attack of the orcs, controlling the elf archer. When choosing a character, pay attention to the characteristics of his shooting. Maybe you prefer being able to fire more powerful shots with a general rate of fire. Having decided on a fighter, you need to move on to the training stage. You should not skip this stage, because in the game about the Shadow of Mordor there will be many situations where one accurate shot can decide the outcome of the battle.
